SELECT FROM
(SELECT `group` FROM groupids WHERE `group` >= #lastContentId# AND `group` >= 3 UNION
SELECT `group` FROM log_groupids WHERE log_date >= #lastLogDate# AND log_reason != 1 LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#) AS lg JOIN groupids g USING (`group`) LEFT JOIN groupids gg ON (g.parent = gg.`group`) LEFT JOIN user u ON (u.user_name = g.group_name)
SELECT lg.`group`, lg.group_name FROM log_groupids lg WHERE log_date >= #lastLogDate# AND log_reason = 1
